title: For all practical purposes. Social choice. 4
brief_description: This program entitled “Zero sum games: games of conflict” deals with strategies employed by parties with conflicting needs, requiring decision-making. Optimal strategies (pure and mixed) are described mathematically with game matrices explained. Presented by Sol Garfunkel.
